<!-- Use this file to provide workspace-specific custom instructions to Copilot. For more details, visit https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/copilot/copilot-customization#_use-a-githubcopilotinstructionsmd-file -->

This project is a Flutter app for a service provider platform. Use Hive for local storage and organize code for easy future migration to Firebase. Models include Users, Services, Bookings, Transactions, and Reviews.
